and management congress New York January Thats only two weeks away weathercallerem pAhttpwwwriskconferencescomweathercclicktohtml The comprehensive agenda will delve deeply into the issues facing weather risk professionals and the choices confronting endusers of weather risk tools today split into two intensively research streams encompassing Buying and trading weather products Investing in the weather market Practical application of weather risk tools Pricing and structuring weather products This truly global event will offer senior representatives from the weather risk industry an ideal opportunity for networking and discussion WeatherRisk will provide an unrivalled platform to examine the current market drivers future possibilities and what must be done to overcome present obstacles to growth Hear from leading practitioners including New products in the weather risk management industry Gary Taylor INDEPENDENT SPECIALIST FORMERLY ENRON How banks can exploit their abilities to aid development of the weather market Gilbert Lavoie SOCIETE GENERALE Peter A Nikitaidis SOCIETE GENERALE Utilising weather securitisation to offset risk Dr Harvey Stern BUREAU OF METEOROLGY AUSTRALIA For the full updated programme please visit the conference website weathercallerem pAhttpwwwriskconferencescomweathercclicktohtml NOTE Corporate endusers will be offered a discount off the standard delegate fee I look forward to meeting you Yours sincerely Frances Tully Divisional Manager Conferences If you know of any colleagues who may also be interested in this event
